description:
Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Ryuji, Honda, and Shizuka for the right to gain control of three bodies at once!  As Shizuka’s lack of dueling experience quickly becomes apparent with bonehead plays, will Shizuka’s errors cost her team the ultimate price when Honda and Ryuji can’t cover for her mistakes?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man`s Path: Honda`s Honorable Defeat
男の花道 本田玉砕
